publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-411 Tom McCabe: Raith Interchange—That the Parliament supports the call by Strathclyde Partnership for Transport to designate Raith Interchange a strategic priority given the economic contribution it is forecast to make and calls on the Scottish Government to bring forward the start date of work on the interchange.
S3M-411 Raith Interchange (lodged on 4 September 2007) Hugh O’Donnell*, Des McNulty*, Alex Neil*

S3M-411 Raith Interchange (lodged on 4 September 2007) David Whitton*, John Park*, Elaine Smith*, Hugh Henry*, Jackie Baillie*, Andy Kerr*, Karen Whitefield*, James Kelly*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Karen Gillon*

S3M-411 Tom McCabe: Raith Interchange—That the Parliament supports the call by Strathclyde Partnership for Transport to designate Raith Interchange a strategic priority given the economic contribution it is forecast to make and calls on the Scottish Government to bring forward the start date of work on the interchange. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell, Des McNulty, Alex Neil, David Whitton, John Park, Elaine Smith, Hugh Henry, Jackie Baillie, Andy Kerr, Karen Whitefield, James Kelly, Ms Wendy Alexander, Karen Gillon, Charlie Gordon*, Patricia Ferguson*
S3M-411 Raith Interchange (lodged on 4 September 2007) Trish Godman*
